intro: Curiosity driven maker, Web Developer, tech enthusiast

bio.school: Computer science student at University of Sherbrooke
bio.looking_internship: I'm looking for an internship this fall. Open to all new opportunity to learn!

about.title: Welcome to my world
about.text: I am primarly a full-stack web developer but I don't like to stop myself at that, give me a challenge or pique my curiosity and that title becomes irrelevant.
about.drive: I love to learn and learn to build great products. I'm driven by the impact my work makes on people's life at any and every scale, big or small.
about.projects: My projects range from IoT devices to Analytics dashboard to computer vision, anything goes.
